You have got to be kidding. This is not a nerf for Ornn. The unstoppable effect on his w isn't the problem. It's the numbers. He shields himself and deals tons of damage, able to deal 17% of the targets max health at level 3. He out trades everyone in top lane and he gets a lead by building items during the lane. You have this champ that scales really well and scales his team mates, who gets items without having to recall and you lose every trade against him so you can't punish him early. And where the hell is Zoe? When is she getting an actual nerf?
If Ornn's numbers weren't so huge, he would be a terrible champion. Remember the state he was in before the avalanche of buffs he received? Reverting those buffs will just put him back in the gutter.
UNSTOPPABLE BTW
